casebody.data:
Michael L. CROFTS, P.A., as Successor Trustee of the 853 Eagle Claw Court Land Trust Dated November 5, 2007, et. al., Appellants,
v.
BANK OF NEW YORK MELLON f/k/a Bank of New York as Successor in Interest to JPmorgan Chase Bank, N.A. as Trustee for Structured Adjustable Rate Mortgage Loan Trust, etc., et al., Appellees. Case No. 5D16-2787 District Court of Appeal of Florida, Fifth District. Decision filed December 26, 2017

DECISION WITHOUT PUBLISHED OPINION

AFFIRMED.
